::: {#hero-heading}

This is the documentation website for MIMIC4 project. 

MIMIC4 is based on the [PhysioNet MIMIC IV database](https://physionet.org/content/mimiciv/3.1/), which is openly accessible however require credentials. Please refer to the official guide for how to acquire the correct access. 

This documentation is for *personal use and going through active development*, so please use with caution. Feedback can be made by either [creating an issue](https://github.com/andreaczhang/mimic4/issues) or  [reaching out to me directly](https://github.com/andreaczhang). 

:::
